Package me.charlie.Ship

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
me.charlie.Ship.Ship
public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
Stores information about the players ship.
Author:
charlie

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Ship

      public Ship​(ShipType shipType, int shipId, double sailSpeed, int maxCargoCapacity, int maxCrewSize, double shipEndurance, Island currentIsland, java.lang.String shipName)
      Creates an instance of Ship.
      Parameters:
      shipType - the type of ship, of type ShipType.
      shipId - the shipId, as an int, used for the console application.
      sailSpeed - the sail speed of the ship, as an int, in km/day.
      maxCargoCapacity - the maximum amount of cargo the ship can hold as an int.
      maxCrewSize - the maximum amount of crew members that can be on the ship, as an int.
      shipEndurance - the damage the ship can take before sinking, ship health starts at maximum.
      currentIsland - the Island object the ship is currently docked at.
      shipName - the name of the ship, as a string, randomly selected from a list of names.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentIsland

      public Island getCurrentIsland()
      Returns:
      the Island object that the ship is currently docked at.

    • setCurrentIsland

      public void setCurrentIsland​(Island currentIsland)
      changes the Island object that the ship is docked at, used whenever the ship travels to a new island.
      Parameters:
      currentIsland - the Island object that the ship is currently docked at.

    • getMaxCargoCapacity

      public int getMaxCargoCapacity()
      Returns:
      the maximum amount of cargo the ship can hold, as an int.

    • getCurrentCargo

      public java.util.List<Item> getCurrentCargo()
      Returns:
      a list of all the Item objects currently on the ship.

    • addReceipt

      public void addReceipt​(Item item)
      Adds an item to a list of Item objects, this is a list of all the items that have been sold by the player.
      Parameters:
      item - an Item object representing an item sold by the player.

    • getReceipts

      public java.util.List<Item> getReceipts()
      Returns:
      a list of all Item objects sold by the player.

    • addItemToCargo

      public boolean addItemToCargo​(Item item)
      Attempts to add an Item object to the list of Item objects currently stored on the ship.
      Parameters:
      item - a Item object purchased by the player
      Returns:
      true if the Item was added, false if it was not.

    • getCargoSpaceRemaining

      public int getCargoSpaceRemaining()
      calculates the amount of space remaining before reaching max cargo capacity.
      Returns:
      the amount of space remaining as an int.

    • getCargoFullness

      public int getCargoFullness()
      calculates how much of the max cargo space is taken up.
      Returns:
      the amount of cargo spaces taken up as an int.

    • isCargoEmpty

      public boolean isCargoEmpty()
      checks if the space remaining is equal to the total space.
      Returns:
      true if there is 0 cargo on the ship.

    • viewCurrentCargo

      public void viewCurrentCargo()
      Prints a list of the all the Item objects on the ship.

    • viewCurrentCargo

      public void viewCurrentCargo​(Store store)
      Prints a list of the current cargo with the price that you can sell it to the current store for.
      Parameters:
      store - the Store object on the current Island.

    • getMaxCrewSize

      public int getMaxCrewSize()
      Returns:
      the maximum amount of crew members a ship can have as an int.

    • getCurrentCrewSize

      public int getCurrentCrewSize()
      Returns:
      the current number of crew members on the ship as an int.

    • getCrewFullness

      public double getCrewFullness()
      Returns:
      how full your crew is as a decimal out of 1.

    • hireCrewMember

      public void hireCrewMember()
      adds a member to the currentCrewSize.

    • getSailSpeed

      public double getSailSpeed()
      Returns:
      the sail speed of the ship, as an int, in km/day.

    • getShipEndurance

      public double getShipEndurance()
      Returns:
      the ships endurance (max health) as a double.

    • getShipHealth

      public double getShipHealth()
      Returns:
      the ships current health as a double.

    • addShipHealth

      public double addShipHealth()
      adds 10% of the ship's total health to it's current health.
      Returns:
      the ship health after adding 10%.

    • repairFull

      public double repairFull()
      sets the ship's current health to full.
      Returns:
      the ship's health after being set to maximum.

    • removeShipHealth

      public double removeShipHealth​(double amountRemoved)
      removes a specified amount of health from the ship's current health.
      Parameters:
      amountRemoved - amount of health to remove as a double.
      Returns:
      the ship's health after removing the specified amount.

    • getShipType

      public ShipType getShipType()
      Returns:
      the ship's type, as a ShipType.

    • getShipId

      public int getShipId()
      Returns:
      the ship's ID as an int.

    • upgradeSailSpeed

      public void upgradeSailSpeed()
      adds 2.5 km/day to the ship sail speed, and increments the number of mast upgrades.

    • upgradeShipEndurance

      public void upgradeShipEndurance()
      upgrades the ship's total health and current health by 50 points. increments the number of bulkhead upgrades.

    • upgradeCargoCapacity

      public void upgradeCargoCapacity()
      upgrades the max cargo capacity of the ship by 2. increments the number of cargo hold upgrades.

    • addCannon

      public void addCannon()
      increments the number of cannon upgrades.

    • getNumberOfCannons

      public int getNumberOfCannons()
      Returns:
      the number of cannon upgrades that have been added to the ship.

    • getNumberOfMastUpgrades

      public int getNumberOfMastUpgrades()
      Returns:
      the number of mast upgrades that have been added to the ship.

    • getNumberOfCargoHoldUpgrades

      public int getNumberOfCargoHoldUpgrades()
      Returns:
      the number of cargo hold upgrades added to the ship.

    • getNumberOfBulkheadUpgrades

      public int getNumberOfBulkheadUpgrades()
      Returns:
      the number of bulkhead upgrades that have been added to the ship.

    • canUpgrade

      public boolean canUpgrade​(UpgradeType upgradeType)
      checks to see if a specified UpgradeType can be applied to the ship.
      Parameters:
      upgradeType - the type of upgrade which is trying to be added.
      Returns:
      true if it can be added, false if not.

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Returns:
      the name of the ship.

    • getProperties

      public java.lang.String getProperties()
      Returns:
      a string of the ships properties.

      converts a ship object to a string.
